sign_in.title: Sign In to publish your scenes

feedback.title: Shape the future of Creator Hub

no_scenes.title: Create your first scene
no_scenes.description: Unleash your creativity. Start building scenes for your LANDs and Worlds and share with the community. Learn more about creating Scenes.

delete_project.title: Are you sure you want to delete "{title}"?
delete_project.remove_imported_scene: This will only remove "{title}" from the Editor. The original scene files on your computer will not be affected

publish_project.title: Publish "{title}"
publish_project.select: Where would you like to deploy your scene to?

worlds.title: Worlds
worlds.description: Your own virtual space, separate from Genesis City. Claim yours when you get a NAME.

select_world.title: Publish to World
select_world.description: Select the Decentraland NAME or ENS Domain that will define the URL
select_world.world_url_description:
The URL to jump in your World will be:

{world_url}
select_world.world_has_content: The existing content in {world} World will be replaced with the new content you're about to publish.
select_world.confirm_world_replace_content: I understand that this action is irreversible

empty_names.title: You don't have any available World
empty_names.description:
Get a free world when you own a NAME.

Each NAME will give you access to one World. You can have as many as you want.

land.title: My Land
land.description: The parcels that make up Decentraland's Genesis City map. Buy or rent your own in the Marketplace.

select_parcel.select_parcel: Select the LANDs that will host your Scene

options.notify: Notify me of new version updates

missing_projects.title: {scenes} {scenes, plural, one {scene} other {scenes}} could not be loaded due to missing files

content.title: Secure sign-in step
content.body:
Remember the verification number below.

You'll be prompted to confirm it in your web browser to securely link your sign in.
content.verification_code_info: Keep this number private. It ensures that your sign-in is secure and unique to you.
content.expiration: Verification number will expire in {minutes}:{seconds} minutes

legacy_web_editor.title: Legacy Web Editor
legacy_web_editor.description: Access the old web editor to continue working on your scenes.

collections.title: Collections
collections.description: Create, review and publish your collections of Wearables and Emotes.

names.title: NAMEs
names.description: Claim your unique name and assign it to your avatar or your parcels.

worlds.title: Worlds
worlds.description: Create and manage your own virtual spaces.

land.title: LAND
land.description: Publish Scenes, creata Estates and manage permissions of your LAND.

new_scene.title: Empty Scene
new_scene.description: Start your own scene from scratch
